channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator

channel.comment: News aggregated from: Krebs on Security, The Hacker News, Threatpost, Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading, ZDNet Security

item.title: Microsoft ships emergency patch to fix Windows 11 startup failures
item.description: Microsoft has released an out-of-band update to address a known issue causing some Windows 11 systems to enter recovery and fail to start after installing the KB5058405 May 2025 security update. [...]...
